name: DSNR Media Group
tag_list: roi, results, optimization, landing--page--optimization, integrated, ad--network, impressions, conversion, online--advertising, digital--marketing, advertisers, publishers-
overview:
DMG - Dsnr Media Group Is a leading global advertising network for online & mobile advertisers, publishers and agencies. Offering unique optimization technology and methodologies along with large scale media aggregation expertise, DMG runs campaigns in over 25 languages, spanning a worldwide market influence of over 20 billion impressions and 190,000,000 users per month.

For advertisers, DMG delivers a comprehensive true cross-platform approach that integrates and then optimizes the major digital marketing activities including: Ad network, sophisticated search engine marketing campaigns and end-to-end Email solutions, accompanied with total control of the value chain, from impression to conversion.

Publishers enjoy full monetization of their media property with high CPM rates from top-tier Advertisers.

DMG recently developed a new technology called Traffiliate. Traffiliate changes the way advertisers are reaching out to customers based on a smart optimization platform which serves the most statistically effective landing pages for converting users on a profile specific basis. Having been tested on some of its largest clients serving over 4,000,000 pages daily, Traffiliate has more than proven its unique approach, rewarding users with increasing conversion rates and higher ROIâ€™s to the tune of 30-200% for both online and mobile campaigns.

A ground-breaker in the mobile field, DMG offers a unique solution for mobile - a sophisticated optimization platform, conversion tracking, aggregation of multiple mobile ad platforms for extensive reach and unified reporting.

video_embeds.description: Traffiliate is a powerful landing page and conversion funnel optimization platform for online and mobile advertising, increasing conversion rates by 30%-200%. Ideal for large-scale campaigns, it matches multiple landing pages with numerous user profiles.
